casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Henry Bridgeforth (7034)

Dupont, C. J., Spallone and Lavery, Js.

Submitted on briefs April 19 decision released May 2, 1990 Vincent Turley filed a brief for the appellant (defendant). John M. Bailey, state’s attorney, and Carolyn K. Longstreth and James Thomas, assistant state’s attorneys, filed a brief for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
